verses.verse: Now it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> upon a day, <S%H3117><s%> that Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the young man <S%H5288><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%> garrison, <S%H4673><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on the other side. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H1975><s%> But he told <S%H5046><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> his father. <S%H1><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> tarried <S%H3427><s%> in the uttermost part <S%H7097><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> a pomegranate tree <S%H7416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Migron: <S%H4051><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H5973><s%> him were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men; <S%H376><s%>

And Ahiah, <S%H281><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> Ichabod's <S%H350><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eli, <S%H5941><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> in Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> wearing <S%H5375><s%> an ephod. <S%H646><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was gone. <S%H1980><s%>

And between <S%H996><s%> the passages, <S%H4569><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to go over <S%H5674><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%> garrison, <S%H4673><s%> there was a sharp <S%H8127><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> on the one <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> and a sharp <S%H8127><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> on the other <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> side: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Bozez, <S%H949><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> Seneh. <S%H5573><s%>

The forefront <S%H8127><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was situated <S%H4690><s%> northward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Michmash, <S%H4363><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> southward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5045><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1387><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the young man <S%H5288><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> uncircumcised: <S%H6189><s%> it may be that <S%H194><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> for us: for <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> restraint <S%H4622><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> or <S%H176><s%> by few. <S%H4592><s%>

And his armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in thine heart: <S%H3824><s%> turn <S%H5186><s%> thee; behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am with <S%H5973><s%> thee according to thy heart. <S%H3824><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we <S%H587><s%> will pass over <S%H5674><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> these men, <S%H376><s%> and we will discover ourselves <S%H1540><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

If <S%H518><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, Tarry <S%H1826><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we come <S%H5060><s%> to <S%H413><s%> you; then we will stand still <S%H5975><s%> in our place, <S%H8478><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

But if <S%H518><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3541><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> us; then we will go up: <S%H5927><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into our hand: <S%H3027><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> unto us.

And both <S%H8147><s%> of them discovered themselves <S%H1540><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the holes <S%H2356><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had hid themselves. <S%H2244><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of the garrison <S%H4675><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armorbearer, <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> us, and we will show <S%H3045><s%> you a thing. <S%H1697><s%> And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his armorbearer, <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> Come up <S%H5927><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> climbed up <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: and they fell <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jonathan; <S%H3083><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> slew <S%H4191><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And that first <S%H7223><s%> slaughter, <S%H4347><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> made, <S%H5221><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> about twenty <S%H6242><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> within as it were a half <S%H2677><s%> acre <S%H4618><s%> of land, <S%H7704><s%> which a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen might plow.

And there was <S%H1961><s%> trembling <S%H2731><s%> in the host, <S%H4264><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and among all <S%H3605><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> the garrison, <S%H4673><s%> and the spoilers, <S%H7843><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> trembled, <S%H2729><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> quaked: <S%H7264><s%> so it was <S%H1961><s%> a very great <S%H430><s%> trembling. <S%H2731><s%>

And the watchmen <S%H6822><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> looked; <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> melted away, <S%H4127><s%> and they went <S%H1980><s%> on beating down <S%H1986><s%> one another.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him, Number <S%H6485><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is gone <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> us. And when they had numbered, <S%H6485><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> and his armorbearer <S%H3627><s%> <S%H5375><s%> were not <S%H369><s%> there.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Ahiah, <S%H281><s%> Bring hither <S%H5066><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that the noise <S%H1995><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went on <S%H1980><s%> and increased: <S%H1980><s%> <S%H7227><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Withdraw <S%H622><s%> thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him assembled themselves, <S%H2199><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the battle: <S%H4421><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> against his fellow, <S%H7453><s%> and there was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> discomfiture. <S%H4103><s%>

Moreover the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> that were <S%H1961><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> before <S%H865><s%> that time, <S%H8032><s%> which <S%H834><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them into the camp <S%H4264><s%> from the country round about, <S%H5439><s%> even they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> turned to be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H5973><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan. <S%H3083><s%>

Likewise all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which had hid themselves <S%H2244><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> even they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> followed hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>

So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> Beth-aven. <S%H1007><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were distressed <S%H5065><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> had adjured <S%H422><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> evening, <S%H6153><s%> that I may be avenged <S%H5358><s%> on mine enemies. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H341><s%> So none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> any food. <S%H3899><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> they of the land <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to a wood; <S%H3293><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the ground. <S%H7704><s%>

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> were come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the wood, <S%H3293><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the honey <S%H1706><s%> dropped; <S%H1982><s%> but no <S%H369><s%> man put <S%H5381><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his mouth: <S%H6310><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the oath. <S%H7621><s%>

But Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> when his father <S%H1><s%> charged the people with the oath: <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> wherefore he put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and dipped <S%H2881><s%> it <S%H853><s%> in a honeycomb, <S%H3295><s%> <S%H1706><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were enlightened. <S%H215><s%>

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of the people, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Thy father <S%H1><s%> straitly charged the people with an oath, <S%H7650><s%> <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> were faint. <S%H5888><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> My father <S%H1><s%> hath troubled <S%H5916><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> how <S%H3588><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have been enlightened, <S%H215><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I tasted <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> honey. <S%H1706><s%>

How much more, <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> if haply <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3863><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> had eaten freely <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> of the spoil <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7998><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they found? <S%H4672><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> had there not <S%H3808><s%> been now <S%H6258><s%> a much greater <S%H7235><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> among the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> from Michmash <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4363><s%> to Aijalon: <S%H357><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> faint. <S%H5888><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> flew <S%H6213><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and calves, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> them on the ground: <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> them with <S%H5921><s%> the blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in that they eat <S%H398><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the blood. <S%H1818><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Ye have transgressed: <S%H898><s%> roll <S%H1556><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Disperse yourselves <S%H6327><s%> among the people, <S%H5971><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Bring me hither <S%H5066><s%> <S%H413><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox, <S%H7794><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and slay <S%H7819><s%> them here, <S%H2088><s%> and eat; <S%H398><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in eating <S%H398><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the blood. <S%H1818><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> brought <S%H5066><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> with <S%H3027><s%> him that night, <S%H3915><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> them there. <S%H8033><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> the same was the first <S%H2490><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let us go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and spoil <S%H962><s%> them until <S%H5704><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and let us not <S%H3808><s%> leave <S%H7604><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them. And they said, <S%H559><s%> Do <S%H6213><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto thee. Then said <S%H559><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> hither <S%H1988><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> asked counsel <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> Shall I go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> wilt thou deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> But he answered <S%H6030><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Draw ye near <S%H5066><s%> hither, <S%H1988><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the chief <S%H6438><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> wherein <S%H4100><s%> this sin <S%H2403><s%> hath been <S%H1961><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
